Description.Name: SRM Inferno Ammo
Description.Details:
Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Ammo Bins will explode and destroy their installed location when they receive a Critical Hit.

Inferno SRMs are missiles containing a napalm-like substance that coats their target in a gel which burns for a short period, applying Heat.

SRM Inferno (Half) Ammo Bins each contain 50 rounds and may feed multiple weapons.
